title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session
name: Info Session
description: Info button, with session persistent open/closed status
author: Mario Pietsch
text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/history","text":"V 0.1.6 - 2024-05-23 * Add stability badges ** The development status of a plugin: deprecated, experimental, stable, or legacy V 0.1.5 - 2022-03-27 * removed from landing page * not maintained anymore V 0.1.5 - 2020-12-25 * Deprecated plugin since the core has a similar function since 5.1.14 V 0.1.4 - 2020-12-25 * update license V 0.1.3 - 2020.01.19 * Update license link/text V 0.1.2 - 2016 * initial release "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/icon","text":""},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/license","text":"[[Info-Session-Plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/#info-session]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2024 https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/info-session/readme","text":"! Deprecated A similar function is part of the TW core since v5.1.14 see: [[ControlPanel : Settings|https://tiddlywiki.com/#%24%3A%2Fcore%2Fui%2FControlPanel%2FSettings%2FInfoPanelMode]] ! Description * This plugin provides a tiddler info button, with a persistent open/close status ''for one browser session''. * The status is saved in a system "$:/state/popup" variable. ** This means, if you reload the TW, the status is gone, sice they are not stored by default! ''Important:'' * This plugin changes the core tiddler: $:/core/ui/Buttons/info ---- If you want persistent state variables, you need to ''add'' the "persistent-states" plugin ''and'' modify the ~ViewTemplate. The ''slant-01 theme" provides this functionality. "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/info":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/info","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","caption":"{{$:/core/images/info-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}}","description":"{{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}}","text":"\whitespace trim <$reveal type="match" text="" default="" state=<> > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="visible"/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/info-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" state=<> > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected" > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/info-button}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Info/Caption}}/> "}}}
